lines.text: [Ann explains the problem of being formerly married]
We can't claim to be the town virgins and can't afford to be the town tramps.
This isn't a family. It's just a bunch of people living at the same address.
The day they squeeze something out of Tony is the day Georgia elects a colored governor.
People change. They don't always turn out the way you expect.
I know. You should see my baby pictures.
